description: The OR_LNLG_TEST_MTHD table contains information about the testing method for a resource used during a patient's surgery. The resource type will determine which intermediary table will be used that links OR_LOG with this table.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DEVICE_TEST_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item documents how a device is tested prior to use.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
